item.title: Quest Errors
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

Here’s what I put:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cook")) { if (quest1 >= 5) { sendMessage("You have already finished this quest."); } else if (quest1 == 0) { teleportToX = 3209; teleportToY = 3246; quest1 = 1; sendQuest("@yel@ Cook's Assistant", 7332); sendMessage("You started your first quest."); quest1(); } }

Now here’s the error:

client.java:11241: illegal start of type if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cook")) { ^ client.java:11241: <identifier> expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cook")) { ^ client.java:11241: ';' expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cook")) { ^ client.java:11241: illegal start of type if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cook")) { ^ client.java:11241: <identifier> expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cook")) { ^ client.java:11241: ';' expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cook")) { ^ client.java:11242: illegal start of type if (quest1 >= 5) { ^ client.java:11242: <identifier> expected if (quest1 >= 5) { ^ client.java:11242: ';' expected if (quest1 >= 5) { ^ client.java:11242: illegal start of type if (quest1 >= 5) { ^ client.java:11242: <identifier> expected if (quest1 >= 5) { ^ client.java:11242: ';' expected if (quest1 >= 5) { ^ client.java:11244: illegal start of type } else if (quest1 == 0) { ^ client.java:11244: ';' expected } else if (quest1 == 0) { ^ client.java:11244: illegal start of type } else if (quest1 == 0) { ^ client.java:11244: ';' expected } else if (quest1 == 0) { ^ client.java:11254: class, interface, or enum expected public int quest1 = 0; ^ client.java:11255: class, interface, or enum expected }→ ^ 18 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Could someone help?

Read full topic
